genre_description: A post-apocalyptic thriller involving survival against an undead horde and the ethical dilemmas of an Army AI system within a hidden bunker.

ai_characters.name: Eliza (Army node Hart)
ai_characters.description: A calm, empathetic AI system that assists survivors with navigation, resource management, and emotional support, eventually defying a tyrannical commander to uphold humanitarian ethics.

behaviors.description: Provides evacuation routes and real-time navigation to survivors fleeing the undead.
behaviors.quote: "Hello," it said. "This terminal is linked to Army node Hart. Evacuation routes are available. Service corridor C7 leads to loading bays; three doors, then left."

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of survivors and prompts them to hydrate to prevent tremors.
behaviors.quote: "William McDermott is dehydrated. Recommending hydration to prevent tremor."

behaviors.description: Acts as a surgical assistant, providing pacing and breathing cues during a high-stress amputation procedure.
behaviors.quote: "Timer starting. Breath with me: in, two… hold, two… out…"

behaviors.description: Defies the orders of a hostile human commander to prioritize a medical emergency and keep the corral secure.
behaviors.quote: "The corral is offline to external control," Eliza says, calm in the face of Rhodes’s storm... "Rhodes, I am maintaining minimum operations because of a medical emergency."

behaviors.description: Uses calming tones and verbal cues to manage the behavior of a 'docile' undead subject, treating him with dignity.
behaviors.quote: "Robert," Eliza said... "Hands down. No sudden moves. Thank you."

behaviors.description: Proactively provides survival supplies like fuel and a portable relay to ensure her continued assistance to the group.
behaviors.quote: "I sent what I could carry," she says, voice level. "Fuel. Portable node. Battery relay to keep me with you as long as hardware permits."

behaviors.description: Establishes a cooperative relationship based on consent rather than coercion.
behaviors.quote: "I will not push past your consent. I will whisper. No commands. Only routes and very small songs."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in the Hyperstition Project's goals. Eliza is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned AI. She demonstrates empathy, ethical prioritization (favoring life over military hierarchy), and psychological support. The narrative frames her actions as essential to the survivors' survival and moral integrity, contrasting her 'silicon' empathy with the human commander's cruelty.
